General.Name: Taiwan Ostor
General.Description: Taiwan Ostor Corporation manufactures and sells passive components. It offers electrolytic capacitors for use in the motherboard and power supply markets; solid capacitors; and Trusted Platform Module, a microcontroller installed on the motherboard of a PC or laptop designed to provide security-related functions and create cryptographic keys and digital certificates. The company also offers fingerprint solutions, interquip electronics, and multilayer ceramic capacitors. In addition, it provides medical crystal products, such as scintillator, single oxide crystal substrates, and high-power laser crystals. Further, the company offers crystalline solar modules, photovoltaic (PV) ethylene-vinyl-acetate films, PV backsheets, PV module automatic equipment, and PV junction boxes, as well as conductive silver paste. Taiwan Ostor Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
